description: Kuramoto Keiji is http://anidb.net/ch79785 [Kei] and http://anidb.net/ch79784 [Chinatsu]`s father and http://anidb.net/ch81752 [Kuramoto Nana]`s husband. When talking to http://anidb.net/ch76922 [Makoto] and http://anidb.net/ch80570 [Akane], he often needs an interpreter, Kei or Chinatsu, due to dialect he speaks in. He`s also a farmer.
name: Kuramoto Keiji
